message.content: {"given_definition_quality":65,"better_definition":"big or large","sentence":"大树。","image_prompt":"A towering, large tree with thick trunk and wide leafy branches, standing alone in an open field. The tree should look inviting, sturdy, and visually dominant in the scene.","sentence_translation":"Big tree."}
